00078 #define __STSLIMNODE_H

00084 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00085 // Class stSlimNode
00086 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00113 class stSlimNode{
00114    public:
00118       enum stSlimNodeType{
00122          INDEX = 0x4449, // In little endian "ID"
00123 
00127          LEAF = 0x464C // In little endian "LF"
00128       };//end stNodeType
00129 
00133       virtual ~stSlimNode(){
00134       }//end ~stSlimNode()
00135 
00142       stNodeType GetNodeType(){
00143          return Header->Type;
00144       }//end GetNodeType
00145 
00151       stPage * GetPage(){
00152          return Page;
00153       }//end GetPage
00154 
00160       stPageID GetPageID(){
00161          return Page->GetPageID();
00162       }//end GetPage
00163 
00170       static stSlimNode * CreateNode(stPage * page);
00171 
00180       stCount GetNumberOfEntries(){
00181          return this->Header->Occupation;
00182       }//end GetNumberOfEntries
00183 
00195       virtual int AddEntry(stSize size, const stByte * object) = 0;
00196 
00207       virtual const stByte * GetObject(stCount idx) = 0;
00208 
00219       virtual stSize GetObjectSize(stCount idx) = 0;
00220 
00224       virtual stDistance GetMinimumRadius() = 0;
00225 
00229       void RemoveAll(){
00230 
00231          #ifdef __stDEBUG__
00232          stNodeType type;
00233          type = Header->Type;
00234          Page->Clear();
00235          Header->Type = type;
00236          #else
00237          this->Header->Occupation = 0;
00238          #endif //__stDEBUG__
00239       }//end RemoveAll
00240 
00244       virtual stCount GetTotalObjectCount() = 0;
00245 
00249       static stSize GetGlobalOverhead(){
00250          return sizeof(stSlimNodeHeader);
00251       }//end GetGlobalOverhead()
00252       
00253    protected:
00257       #pragma pack(1)
00258       typedef struct stSlimNodeHeader{
00262          stNodeType Type;
00263 
00267          stCount Occupation;
00268       } stSlimNodeHeader; //end stHeader
00269       #pragma pack()
00270 
00274       stSlimNodeHeader * Header;
00275 
00279       stPage * Page;
00280 
00286       stSlimNode(stPage * page){
00287          this->Page = page;
00288          Header = (stSlimNodeHeader *)(this->Page->GetData());
00289       }//end stSlimNode
00290 };//end stSlimNode

00292 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00293 // Class stSlimIndexNode
00294 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00325 // +---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
00326 // | Type | Occupation | PgID0 | Dist0 | NEnt0 | Radius0 | OffSet0 |...|PgIDn | Distn | NEntn | Radiusn | OffSetn | <-- blankspace --> |Objn |...|Obj0 |
00327 // +---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
00328 class stSlimIndexNode: public stSlimNode{
00329    public:
00333       #pragma pack(1)
00334       typedef struct stSlimIndexEntry{
00338          stPageID PageID;
00339 
00343          stDistance Distance;
00344 
00348          stCount NEntries;
00349 
00353          stDistance Radius;
00354 
00360          stSize Offset;
00361       } stSlimIndexEntry; //end stIndexEntry
00362       #pragma pack()
00363 
00375       stSlimIndexNode(stPage * page, bool create = false);
00376 
00390       stSlimIndexEntry & GetIndexEntry(stCount idx){
00391          #ifdef __stDEBUG__
00392          if (idx >= GetNumberOfEntries()){
00393             throw invalid_argument("idx value is out of range.");
00394          }//end if
00395          #endif //__stDEBUG__
00396 
00397          return Entries[idx];
00398       }//end GetIndexEntry
00399 
00418       virtual int AddEntry(stSize size, const stByte * object);
00419 
00423       int GetRepresentativeEntry();
00424 
00435       const stByte * GetObject(stCount idx);
00436 
00446       stSize GetObjectSize(stCount idx);
00447 
00456       void RemoveEntry(stCount idx);
00457 
00461       virtual stDistance GetMinimumRadius();
00462 
00466       virtual stCount GetTotalObjectCount();
00467       
00471       static stSize GetIndexEntryOverhead(){
00472          return sizeof(stSlimIndexEntry);
00473       }//end GetIndexEntryOverhead()
00474 
00475    private:
00476 
00480       stSlimIndexEntry * Entries;
00481 
00485       stSize GetFree();
00486 
00487 };//end stSlimIndexPage

00489 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00490 // Class stSlimLeafNode
00491 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00520 // +--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
00521 // | Type | Occupation | Dist0 | OffSet0 | Distn | OffSetn | <-- blankspace --> |Objn |...|Obj0 |
00522 // +--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
00523 class stSlimLeafNode: public stSlimNode{
00524    public:
00528       #pragma pack(1)
00529       typedef struct stSlimLeafEntry{
00533          stDistance Distance;
00534 
00540          stSize Offset;
00541       } stSlimLeafEntry; //end stLeafEntry
00542       #pragma pack()
00543 
00555       stSlimLeafNode(stPage * page, bool create = false);
00556 
00570       stSlimLeafEntry & GetLeafEntry(stCount idx){
00571          #ifdef __stDEBUG__
00572          if (idx >= GetNumberOfEntries()){
00573             throw invalid_argument("idx value is out of range.");
00574          }//end if
00575          #endif //__stDEBUG__
00576 
00577          return Entries[idx];
00578       }//end GetLeafEntry
00579 
00598       virtual int AddEntry(stSize size, const stByte * object);
00599 
00605       int GetRepresentativeEntry();
00606 
00617       const stByte * GetObject(stCount idx);
00618 
00628       stSize GetObjectSize(stCount idx);
00629 
00640       void RemoveEntry(stCount idx);
00641 
00645       virtual stDistance GetMinimumRadius();
00646 
00650       virtual stCount GetTotalObjectCount(){
00651          return (stCount)GetNumberOfEntries();
00652       }//end GetTotalObjectCount()
00653       
00657       static stSize GetLeafEntryOverhead(){
00658          return sizeof(stSlimLeafEntry);
00659       }//end GetLeafEntryOverhead()
00660       
00661    private:
00665       stSlimLeafEntry * Entries;
00666 
00670       stSize GetFree();
00671 };//end stSlimLeafNode

00673 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00674 // Class stSlimMemLeafNode
00675 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00695 template < class ObjectType >
00696 class stSlimMemLeafNode{
00697    public:
00698 
00705       stSlimMemLeafNode(stSlimLeafNode * leafNode);
00706       
00715       stSlimLeafNode * ReleaseNode();
00716    
00727       bool Add(ObjectType * obj, stDistance distance);
00728 
00732       stCount GetNumberOfEntries(){
00733          return this->numEntries;
00734       }//end GetNumberOfObjects
00735 
00743       ObjectType * ObjectAt(stCount idx){
00744          #ifdef __stDEBUG__
00745             if (idx >= this->numEntries){
00746                throw invalid_argument("idx value is out of range.");
00747             }//end if
00748          #endif //__stDEBUG__
00749          return Entries[idx].Object;
00750       }//end ObjectAt
00751 
00758       ObjectType * LastObject(){
00759          return Entries[this->numEntries-1].Object;
00760       }//end LastObject
00761 
00767       ObjectType * RepObject(){
00768          return Entries[0].Object;
00769       }//end RepObject
00770 
00777       stDistance DistanceAt(stCount idx){
00778          #ifdef __stDEBUG__
00779             if (idx >= this->numEntries){
00780                throw invalid_argument("idx value is out of range.");
00781             }//end if
00782          #endif //__stDEBUG__
00783 
00784          return Entries[idx].Distance;
00785       }//end DistanceAt
00786 
00791       stDistance LastDistance(){
00792          return Entries[this->numEntries-1].Distance;
00793       }//end LastDistance
00794 
00801       ObjectType * Remove(stCount idx);
00802 
00806       ObjectType * PopObject();
00807 
00813       bool CanAdd(ObjectType * obj){
00814          int entrySize;
00815 
00816          // Does it fit ?
00817          entrySize = obj->GetSerializedSize() + stSlimLeafNode::GetLeafEntryOverhead();
00818          if (entrySize + this->usedSize > this->maximumSize){
00819             // No, it doesn't.
00820             return false;
00821          }//end if
00822          // yes, it does.
00823          return true;
00824       }//end CanAdd
00825 
00831       stDistance GetMinimumRadius(){
00832          return Entries[this->numEntries-1].Distance;
00833       }//end GetMinimumRadius                    
00834 
00840       stSize GetFreeSize(){
00841          return (this->maximumSize - this->usedSize);
00842       }//end GetFreeSize
00843 
00844    private:
00848       struct stSlimMemNodeEntry{
00852          ObjectType * Object;
00853 
00857          stDistance Distance;
00858       };
00859 
00863       stCount numEntries;
00864       
00868       stCount capacity;
00869       
00873       stSlimMemNodeEntry * Entries;
00874       
00878       stSize maximumSize;
00879       
00883       stSize usedSize;
00884       
00888       stSlimLeafNode * srcLeafNode; 
00889 
00898       int InsertPosition(stDistance distance); 
00899       
00904       void Resize(stCount incSize = 16);
00905       
00906 };//end stSlimMemLeafNode
